title: Day 1: Awareness Journal
description: Write down every time you feel the urge. Reflect on your triggers.

title: Day 2: Distraction Technique
description: Practice a healthy distraction (walk, call a friend) when urges arise.

title: Day 1: Social Warm-up
description: Greet 3 people today, even if just a smile or hello.

title: Day 1: Self-Assessment
description: List your top 5 strengths and 3 areas to improve.

title: Day 1: Active Listening
description: Have a conversation and focus only on listening, not responding.

title: Day 1: Positive Reinforcement
description: Praise your child for a positive behavior today.

title: Day 1: Mindful Breathing
description: Spend 5 minutes focusing on your breath and being present.

title: Day 1: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
description: Tense and relax each muscle group for 10 seconds.

title: Day 1: Self-Compassion Journal
description: Write a kind note to yourself about something you struggled with.
